name: My Square Story
description:
First,  the little square was alone, then he moves and the story begins.

For the Pocket Jam #1 of Gamecodeur, i've made that visual novel who tells you a part of my life, inspired by my 4 month of learnings at my video game online school.

As the little square goes on his adventure, the world is changing around him, representing the evolution of my skills .

Game made in Lua with Löve2D

Graphics entirely made by me.

Music: Myuu- Tender Remains

Made in around 25 hours.

Special thanks to my family for inspiring me this prototype  <3 .
